item.name: 1 - Create tenant
1.1 Get access token for source tenant
1.2 Get signed license key
1.3 Get access token for registration tenant
1.4 Create new tenant
1.5 Get access token for target tenant
1.6 Confirm access to target tenant
2 - Add Qlik Account user on target tenant
2.1 Get access token for source tenant
2.2 Retrieve user subject by email on the source tenant
2.3 Get access token for target tenant
2.4 Add the user to the target tenant as TenantAdmin
3 - Configure tenant
3.1 Get access token for target tenant
3.2 Enable auto group creation
3.3 Configure auto license assignment
3.4 Create new group
3.5 Create Shared Space
3.6 Create Managed Space
3.7 Assign group to managed space
4 - Deploy application
4.1 Get access token for source tenant
4.2 Find source app id on source tenant
4.3 Request app export
4.4 Download binary from temp contents
4.5 Get access token for target tenant
4.6 Import app to shared space on target tenant
4.7 Publish app to managed space on target tenant
5 - Deploy automation
5.1 Get access token for source tenant
5.2 Find source automation id and owner on source tenant
5.3 Get bot user id
5.4 Change owner of automation to bot user
5.5 Get automation definition
5.6 Change owner of automation to original user
5.7 Get access token for target tenant
5.8 Initial request to automation service
5.8 Deploy automation to target tenant

variable.value: Webhook assign new user to space
